Overlord.description: You're extreme. You're the leader of all evil, you have power over all the evil, you're what created the word evil. And evil is how you survive.

Demon Hunt.effect: Find out if a player is evil or not.

Reanimate.effect: Reanimate a dead player and be able to use any abilities they didn't use.

Discover.effect: Find the exact role of a player ignoring everything.

perks.Evil Aura: You get x1.5 higher Immunity Card chances and +2 Luck if everyone in your alliance is not opposite your alignment.
perks.Legion: You may have 1 additional person in your alliance, should you choose to allow it.
perks.Seize: You'll find out your alliance gets an Immunity Card before everyone else and may choose to take it without anyone knowing.

achievements.Hunting Haul: Find 9 or all evil players in a game.

Phantom.description: Inflicting special curses on many, the days go by, their life ticks down.

Abyssal Curse.effect: Select someone, gain a use of this every day. The person will suffer the longer the curse is on them. Refer to perks.

Shadowed Hands.effect: Speed up all Abyssal effected by a day. Gain a charge if someone dies once past/at 6 days.

Abyssal Blessings.effect: Free someone of choice from the Abyssal curse, giving them lucky.

perks.Abyssal Cursing:
The longer it goes on, the more they suffer:
0 Days - Inflict a status of choice [excluding DC/Emp].
1 Day - Inflicted with 2 statuses of choice [^] that they are not immune to, if immune to all, remove 2 immunities.
[Cannot inflict blackmail twice in a row to the same target]
2 Days - Their actions have a 10% chance to effect someone random.
3 Days - They have a ability degraded of their choice. 
4 Days - They have a  perk degraded of their choice. 10% more chance to effect someone random.
5 Days - All abilities, including AAs are degraded.
6 Days - All perks are degraded. 10% more chance to effect someone random.
7 Days - Completely wipe their coins and items. 20% more chance to effect someone random.
8 Days - Their entire role and AAs are disabled. 
9 Days+ - Additional 10% per day to effect someone random.
perks.Abyssal Bound: Abyss curse victims cannot vote you from Day 2+.
perks.Phantom's Grasp: If you die, all abyssal curses will stop functioning, but will come back if you are revived.
perks.Abyssal Shadow: You may gain the investigation results of an abyssal cursed person of choice.

achievements.Hunting Haul: Find 9 or all evil players in a game.

Psychotherapist.description: A name given to those who help psychos and the like

Gaslighted Discussion.effect: Select someone, inflicting despair and disable, but also giving elimination immunity. Next elimination they will have x2 votes against them.

Silver-Tongue.effect: Select someone, inflicting despair and disable.

Ignorance Bubble.effect: Your alliance blocks votes from outside of the alliance. Everyone in your alliance other than you has votes on them worth x5.

perks.Abusive: If someone uses a negative item on you more than once, inflict paralysis and burn on them, along with finding out their identity.
perks.Corruption: Each time you save someone with your abilities, gain +3 luck. Each time your abilities assist in killing someone, gain +30% coins.
perks.Watchful Eye: The second time and onwards somebody votes for you; you will be told their identity after the elimination.

Double Edged.effect: Select 2 people, both will be forced into a public duel, much like that of an excal duel. The first 2 rounds cannot get external help effects. You claim the coins, items and AAs of whoever dies, potentially both. If Slaughterer - if you enter the duel yourself, your opponent will have external help do nothing for them.

Skinning.effect: Select someone, stripping them of all their AA's, you gain a random one.

Bone Breaker.effect: Smash someone up, giving unlucky, burning, paralysing, disable, frozen, despairing and restraining them. The permanent effects are removed when you die.

Corpse Shield.effect: Pick someone, once they die, they will take any hits from lethal actions for you for 1 hit. Upon target hit, regain a charge if you are Slaughterer.

perks.Freakish Nature: Your non-aligned allies do not gain any luck in your alliance, you instead have theirs added to yours. This is added before your own lucky/unlucky but after their lucky/unlucky/perk calculations.
perks.Blood Luster: Killing items cannot kill you when you use them, and can be manipulated by you to a degree.
perks.Body Count: Each time you murder someone / cause a murder, gain an immunity of choice, including 1 time elim immunity, along with +30% coin bonuses.

achievements.Meat Shield: Successfully redirect 2 attacks through the use of Corpse Shield.
achievements.Flayed: Destroy 5 AA's with the use of Skinning.

Threatener.description: Your only way of living is by threatening over people to do what you want.

Steal.effect: If player you chose has any items, you will take them all.

Shutdown.effect: Target a player, blackmail them and prevent their alliance from voting at the next elimination.

Redirect.effect: Redirect a player to visit a player of your choice next time they visit somebody. They will not be informed.

Survivalists Threaten.effect: Prevent two players from voting two players of your choice for the next elimination. Can prevent players from voting yourself.

perks.Dealer: Allows you to transfer coins to somebody. Anyone in the Threatener's alliance can also transfer money to each other. The Threatener can choose who within the alliance can do this.

achievements.Bully: Shutdown an alliance with a member that was voting you.
achievements.Takeover: Use Survivalist's Threaten in the Final 5 or lower.

Witchdoctor.description: You were born with crazy magicial healing powers, but instead of making good use of them, you decided you abuse them. Your abusing has made you into a devious Sorcereress who causes chaos and disruption.

Soul Binding.effect: Choose 2 players. Those players are now connected, and if one of them dies the other does too. All status ailments/effects and buffs are shared as well. Link is broken when you die.

Voodoo Doll.effect: Make a Voodoo Doll of someone, anything that happens to you will also happen to them, aside from receiving votes and being eliminated. This Voodoo Doll becomes an item in your inventory and whoever holds the item has this power.

Hex.effect: Whoever is affected by the Hex, can use their next item twice. You cannot loop this ability via empower giving items.

perks.Insane: You cannot become Despaired, Drunk or Blackmailed.
perks.Magic Mind: Your actions and votes cannot be controlled by anyone or anything.

achievements.Hexed: Have someone use an item twice due to your Hex.
achievements.Play Time: Transfer 3 effects due to Voodoo Doll.

Ball.description: Let's get rolling, let's get going, once it's rolling, you can't stop it-

Rolling.effect: Send a notification to the game that a ball is rolling. Gain immunity to a status of choice, and +1 vote power at the next elimination. 12 hour cooldown.

Bouncing.effect: It will be publically announced that *you* are the ball, however 12 hours from using this ability, you gain permanent death immunity.

Speed Up.effect: Activates once you have used bouncing, +1 vote power permanently. 24 hour cool down.

perks.Obviously a Ball: You cannot obtain investigation immunity in any way.
perks.Uncontrolable: Once you have used bouncing, your actions cannot be redirected or blocked in any way.

Half-Swording.effect: Select someone, if they attempt to harm you, you will render them unable to act for 12 hours.

Hand Off.effect: You may decide to give whoever is most in the lead in your chosen requirement for end elimination, the ability to pick who dies instead of yourself. They can also choose to kill you instead, bypassing your elim immunity.

perks.Exectuioner's Blade: While alive, every elimination is a double elimination, but the 2nd elimination will have candidates put up for you to pick from, based on terms you put up at day start. You do not need to kill someone.
perks.Pen & Blade: You may not vote, you learn who is voting you. You survive one elimination. You may publicly reveal who voted you upon your death.
perks.Intimidating Aura: You may join alliances, not taking up a slot. You increase immunity card chances by 1.25, but you decide who gets it, based on whom in the alliance is top of the previous requirement (top 50% of alliance).

Merchant.description: I'm here to talk to you about your car's extended warranty.

The Deal.effect: Players may start trades with you for your items. You may trade what you deem to be of equal value.

Swindle.effect: Upon use, the next deal received, you may totally rip the person off.

perks.Bribery Benefits:
Your vote is worth 2, you may vote 3 times, but only with whoever gave you the most in:
Money (coin total)
Items (based on value)
Abilities (based on positiveness/rarity)
People may hand you money and aas freely. Draws mean neither get it, and every new day the totals are reset.
perks.Many Wares: You have infinite inventory space. You gain 2 items every day and start with 6 items. Your luck is randomly between 5-15 every time it is rolled.
perks.Cargo Cart: You may join multiple alliances not taking a slot. Alliance members have -25% luck but gain 1-2 additional items in item rains, and -50% luck in power drops but gain an additional aa.
perks.Banker's Jeaolusy: While alive all shop items cost 10% more. You may make 2 items you have cost 25% more.
